name: ThePirateBay.org - Clean Dark & Light
description:
The Pirate Bay with less clutter and modernized UI

ThePirateBay - Clean

A modern and decluttered take on the classic Pirate Bay theme.

Supports native light and dark themes

By using CSS prefers-color-scheme the theme can display a dark grey version of ThePirateBay when dark mode is enabled on the OS and vice versa.
additional_info:
Requirements

  • A style plugin for your browser. (Such as Stylus or Stylish)
  • An Operative System that supports dark mode (Windows 10, MacOS Mojave, Android 11, iOS 13...)
  • A web browser that supports prefers-color-scheme

Installation

Either:

  1. Install from userstyles.org
  2. Or directly here on GitHub.
